description: The two men were on an Alpine run and authorities said they should not have left their local area.
title: Italian runner faces Covid fine after Simone Massetti's fatal fall
title_page: Italian runner faces Covid fine after Simone Massetti's fatal fall - BBC News
maintext: Under the rules for red zones, you are allowed to go out for a run, a walk or a bike ride but you have to stay near your home and not leave your municipality. Carabinieri military police determined the two men had strayed too far, local reports say.
